website_summaries.verdict: Blending a streamlined form of modern design with easy assembly, this bed is one of the best choices for an affordable, good-looking platform bed.
pros: 24 wooden slats offer support and comfort
Minimal profile allows for oversize mattresses and comforters if desired
Colors are neutral to blend with a number of designs
cons: Screws can strip out with a little bit of force or use

customer_reviews.title: we love it!
customer_reviews.text: Pointers! -easy to assemble -all parts will be used, no extra so dont messed up -matress covers the whole frame, unlike as advertised in the photos -wood seems flimsy, ill update this as time goes by. If there will be no update, everything is good -best for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Harrie Alexis

customer_reviews.title: Seriously sturdy and attractive.
customer_reviews.text: I wish I had bought something like this for my special needs teenager a long time ago. We have been through four beds in a year and a half. Box springs end up shredded and broken. Mattresses end up torn. This sucker has lasted a year now and still kicking. We got him one of those memory foam mattresses too. Still intact. Haha son try to rip that up!!! Anyway, this platform has withstood tantrums, rages, playtime, sleep time, and the enormous effort my kid goes to to see how something works by taking it apart and putting it back together (not....he doesn’t actually put it back together)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but flawed
customer_reviews.text: My bed arrived earlier this week. This bed has a gorgeous look and feel to it and took a little over an hour to put together. But while unboxing I noticed mine arrived with wooden slats that were warped and thin and brittle enough that the plastic endings used to secure them into frame sliced through a few of them causing them to strip and break and when I tried removing the plastic endings from the frame to fix the slats the plastic endings broke leaving me unable to resecure the slats. I also found that a few of the panels needed to assemble the drawers were not in my box I received.
customer_reviews.author: Centralwarhawk70

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Very clear instructions, its easy to follow but there are a lot of parts! I have mine against a wall so a screwed the two drawers together to make a very long pullout drawer.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Great bed
customer_reviews.text: I have just purchased this bed frame a week ago. So far the bed is awesome and the slats that hold the mattress are very sturdy. The only bad thing about the bed is when putting it together you use an allen wrench for about 95% of it which when putting some of the screws in it’s very bad to get them tightened.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Gower

customer_reviews.title: Falls a part very easily if you move it
customer_reviews.text: This bed was a guest bed and it has broken and fallen a part many times over the past 2 years. We have had a small chinese student that sleeps on the bed and the boards break or frame falls apart even after putting extra screws and other material to hold it up. I would buy the 5 year warranty or stay away unless you want to buy another frame within 2 years
customer_reviews.author: Darlyn R. Mclaughlin

customer_reviews.title: My mattress is so much more comfortable! This bed provides support
customer_reviews.text: This bed frame is AMAZING. I put it together by myself in 3 hours. My mattress is SO much more comfortable with this bed frame. You most definitely do not need a box spring. The way the slats go on the bed its much more comfortable wothout one. I am beyond happy with this bed and I have trou le buying expensive things but I would 100% recomend it and buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: LovelyLady

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, nice looking, useful, easy to assemble!
customer_reviews.text: This bed is very sturdy and very nice looking! It is easy to assemble, too. My tween child assembled all of it herself except the drawer, without assistance from either of us, following the provided directions. The drawer is large, more than big enough to store an extra set of bedding. My child is very pleased with her new bed, and so are we!
customer_reviews.author: NessieJade

customer_reviews.title: Bed broke :(
customer_reviews.text: Bed broken after 4 months :( Waste of money. The wood slat gave out and the mattess fell in.
customer_reviews.author: helenrzs

customer_reviews.title: Great Value and Simple Assembly
customer_reviews.text: Shocked!...Amazing quality for price. Assembly was simple and all the holes were aligned and the bed is square. No missing hardware. No broken pieces or scratches/dents. Bed pieces and upholsry were well protected In the and, everything fit tight and is stable and not wobbly or squeaky. Instruction manual MIA but no sttess...just Google the bed name and enter the #IM Number" that's on the box label to download instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Kiki Nash

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly disappointing
customer_reviews.text: It's a really nice frame. I love the drawers and the amount of space I have. However, the wooden mattress support pieces are not very thick or sturdy at all. I have had this frame for not even a month and have already broken 3 of them. ****Edit**** already had to buy a new frame, I'm a light sleeper and barely home and it's pretty much completely fallen apart despite trying to fix it myself with new wooden support beams.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality, looks good, would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Love it, appearance, quality, very happy. Just be careful adjusting to the corners when walking around the bed, if you have a comforter hanging over the corner, they can scratch your leg because it is wood covered with fabric. If you have kids, I would get black Styrofoam pieces and stick right over the corner points until everyone "gets it" Also, I read different things about set up. It is easy to understand, but it does require some strength, do not kid yourself. You have to pull and hold and screw areas but once they are in place others things are easier. Two people are better.
customer_reviews.author: IT'S ME SB

customer_reviews.title: Nice storage bed
customer_reviews.text: I like this bed. Love the two storage drawers which is main reason I bought it due to living in a small space. (Wish it had more!) I am 69 and it took me a little over 3 hours to put it together. I laid everything out in order and carried each piece in the bedroom and followed the directions and took my time. I thought I messed up but I didn’t. Very proud of myself doing this by myself. I have no issue with the bed and have had it for a few months now. Box was left at my front step so I opened it and pulled pieces out and carried them inside since the box was heavy.
customer_reviews.author: sandy

customer_reviews.title: Snap the middle pieces all the way down. Tighten the bolts holding the hooks at the end
customer_reviews.text: I like it, I read the reviews and was worried about the flimsy wood (which is actually pretty sturdy) in the middle but I made sure I pushed them all the way through and all the way into the metal frame, there was a huge snap sound that made it secure. At the end I tightened the bolts holding the sections together, there should be no way those things come loose, not any wiggle room. ONE OF MY MIDDLE SECTIONS HAD A BROKEN ATTACHEMENT, THE LiTTLE PLASTIC THINGS, HOPE I COULD FIND OR GET A NEW PIECE, CAME THAT WAY IN THE BOX. OTHER THAN THAT ITS GOOD AND STURDY. TOOK 1 HOUR TO ASEMBLE, maybe even less.
customer_reviews.author: LJ20

customer_reviews.title: DON'T BUY
customer_reviews.text: THE SLATS KEEP BREAKING SO ITS NOT STURDY AT ALL
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just want i needed!
customer_reviews.text: I’m not one to assemble anything but this bed was fairly easy to set up all alone and it only took me 2 ish hours and that was while i was watching tv. Looks amazing! The drawers are nicely sized and fit a lot. I didn’t like that the drawers on not on a hindge instead they roll on your floor but it still is really functional. I’ll probably want to get a rug underneath the drawers part because it will probably ruin my floors in time. But overall a very very beautiful bed.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Not Accurate Size
customer_reviews.text: This platform bed is a "twin" and so is the mattress (also pictured). The product photo is not accurate, I was anticipating that the mattress fit onto the slats and not cover the entire platform (as in the product photo). That is not the case, as you can see. The slat area looked like it would fit a crib mattress and then the overhang. I'm guessing I should have purchased the full size so that my twin mattress would fit properly and have the overhang on each side. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Sheena Childress

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Well made and sturdy, my only con is that the matress slats are curved so it feels a bit weird when sitting on the edge of the bed.so either it bows a bit in the middle or it sinks a bit depending on how you put them in.perhaps it will even out over time
customer_reviews.author: latara

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy - slats break and replacement costs are exorbitant
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this bed for my son several years ago. He's a big kid and an athlete -- 6 feet tall and around 190 lbs. He has broken several of the wooden slats just by sitting on the bed. I just called DHP to see about getting a few replacement slats, and they quoted me $85 for four slats (including shipping), which is absurd! We will figure something else out -- maybe put down plywood or something to replace the slats -- but I will NEVER buy anything made by this company again.
customer_reviews.author: Adam - penguin man (543546)-5446-3342

customer_reviews.title: easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Cheap, sleek, easy to assemble. Whats not to love? Edit: After owning the bed for a few months the brackets that hold the mattress up began to break. Now after a full year each one has been duct-taped numerous times and I seriously need new ones. It's a good looking bed, and very easy to assemble but the wood panels are cheap and poor quality. If Amazon or the seller is kind enough to contact me I would happily readjust my review
customer_reviews.author: Michael Moran

customer_reviews.title: Pictures are misleading. Rather flimsy.
customer_reviews.text: The picture shows the mattress sits int the middle of the bed with a border around it. In reality the mattress covers the borders too. You can get a cheap 50$ metal frame to get the same visual effects. If you want something that has the bed sitting in the center then you should try something else.
customer_reviews.author: Tesla

customer_reviews.title: High-quality & beautiful bedframe at excellent price!
customer_reviews.text: This bedframe is everything; I bought it because I was tired of my current headboard/bedspring setup and I have no regrets. It took 45mins to assemble, the instructions were very clear and easy to follow, everything you need is in the box. The bed itself looks more expensive than it is when it is fully assembled; the faux leather look is an excellent touch. I was worried about sturdiness but I have had no reason to complain so far, it holds the mattress up and flat. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Eniola

customer_reviews.title: No more lost socks
customer_reviews.text: Great bed. Needed a bed for my son that would not let everything get under it. I was tired i having to pull socks, toys you name it from under his previous bed. This was perfect. Stylish, no box spring need so we're just bought a new mattress and voila done. Easy to put together too. It's not real leather (which I'm sure you understand from the price) but very nice quality vinyl all the same. Soft to touch and so far seems durable.
customer_reviews.author: Izzy

customer_reviews.title: Aesthetically pleasing, comfortable, quick response from producer
customer_reviews.text: The only reason I am giving 4 instead of 5 stars is due to the fact that a piece was missing. I did contact the company (not the seller) and was shipped the missing bracket in less than a week from sending the email. It is super easy to assemble and we have been happy with it. It is a gorgeous floating frame. I was skeptical at first since the beams seemed to be a bit lacking and they are connected with plastic as opposed to metal, but all in all they are sturdy. We have been using it with a hybrid mattress, no box spring, and have been very pleased
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I forgot at add photos but i love this frame
customer_reviews.text: EASY ASSEMBLY I didn't realize I didn't need tools. One hour done seems sturdy. I have a zenus foam mattress on it and its like heaven. Product is heavy so if your putting it up stairs open box and bring up in portions Set up and instructions are way to EASY I thought I would break it. No weird smell Tools needed come with. The set looked rough but all other parts were fine no broken or missing prices I got the black one and its pretty sweet.
customer_reviews.author: ashley

customer_reviews.title: Look, feel, solid and nice bed frame.
customer_reviews.text: Great bed, very nice looking and upholstered soft act like sponge protection to small kid.easy assembly. Everything included, the right size and the right price. Oh forgot to mention that it's doesn't look as strong, but a solid piece and stable no warbling.
customer_reviews.author: LAROEUN TAN

customer_reviews.title: Get that mattress off the floor!
customer_reviews.text: A great value. I'll be honest, the biggest selling point in this for me is there is no space for things to get underneath. I got tired of fishing tennis balls from under the bed while playing with the dogs. It was easy to assemble, even for a dummy like me. Pros: Easy to follow the instructions for assembly No creaks or groans even with two people and two dogs sleeping on it Pleasant, subtle styling Cons: Not a perpetual motion machine
customer_reviews.author: Leif

customer_reviews.title: OMG I'm so happy about this buy
customer_reviews.text: OMG I'm so happy about this buy! It was so heavy I had to strategically slide it into the house from the porch and that intimidated me but as soon as I sorted all of the parts out and got into assembling it was super easy! I thought it might be a 2 person job but I put everything together on my own before my bf even got home and I gotta say that the quality of it is great! And I sleep really great!
customer_reviews.author: Bethany

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a 26 year old college student that invested in a small manufactured home instead of an apartment. So weight was going to be a factor when deciding on a new bed frame. Love making was also a concern, as cheap frames made from melamine easily break. Also, personally I do not like frames that are high and empty in the bottom as it allows for dust and clutter to accumulate. So, this product was able to check off all my worries! Drawers are great and frame is made from metal with lots of points of intersection for reinforcement. Packaging was amazing!! The screws and bolts came in a nice organized packet and the boards came individually wrapped.
customer_reviews.author: Shinigami

customer_reviews.title: Broken parts
customer_reviews.text: So got the bed together and was pretty pleased until I saw most of the wood slot pieces are broken. I’m so mad because I wasn’t to get this done before my kid got home and I encounter this crap. Her other bed is all broken down in the garage and I’m so upset I can’t believe it.
customer_reviews.author: Channel Alexander

customer_reviews.title: have to say that it was super easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Was a little skeptical about purchasing this bed at first. But, have to say that it was super easy to put together. If you can’t say your ABC’s and your 123’s then this bed isn’t for you. We had it fully assembled in an hour and a half. That was including taking time away to have dinner. It can be done with one person, but I would recommend having a helping hand just to be safe. It was definitely worth the price. And honestly am surprised that it was not more expensive. My 16 yr old son loves it.
customer_reviews.author: mr&mrsC

customer_reviews.title: Great bed box but couple flaws
customer_reviews.text: So got this today. Love it. It raises my bed higher and its real sturdy so far. My only 2 gripes wiht it is 1: some of the holes are mismatched so when you have the other screws in, you cant quite get that last one in unless you drill a new hole. 2: Like others, it was missing a couple parts, but the parts it were missing were the endcap pieces which werent that big a deal. Its agains the wall anyways. Other than that, love it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: not sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I really hate this bed fram I've had for about a yr the size was different so it did not fit my bed my bed was hanging on the edges so it defeated why I wanted this bed the frame does not hold support the wood pieces that go underneath the bed are ALWAYS coming apart and it's not like memory foam beds and light mines pretty heavy so every other month or so I have to lift the bed and put the wood piece and plastic pieces back together and the actual frame screws come lose no matter how hard i tighten them let's just say its not a sturdy bed
customer_reviews.author: matt huerta

customer_reviews.title: Nice and Simple -- Updated
customer_reviews.text: Wheels on drawers already broke and so did the planks on the platform. This was pretty good bang for the buck. I have a smaller room and needed the extra storage and a slim profile platform and this did the job. I will say the drawers are big but not as deep as they say in the reviews and you can't stack anything too high because it needs to clear the bar from the bed frame where it locks into. Also make sure you have a good space to pull drawers out on both sides.
customer_reviews.author: E The Sav

customer_reviews.title: Misleading Picture But Love It Still
customer_reviews.text: Partially my own fault, I trusted the picture instead of looking at the dimensions. Rookie mistake. The bed absolutely will not look like how it does in the picture. The picture shows there being a small amount of room around the mattress so you can see the platform. I wasn’t too upset with how it actually came out, it is 100% flush with the exact size of the mattress. A king mattress is 76x80 and thats the same dimensions as the bed frame. Overall still very happy. Easy to put together and very sturdy. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: M.T.

customer_reviews.title: Low Profile Bed with 2 Drawers
customer_reviews.text: As storage is paramount but sparse in my Victorian house, I bought this bed. It is sleek, understated and would fit just about any decor. I find, however, that it is lower than most beds. Maybe people put an extra memory foam layer on top of the mattress? The slats are normal and sprung. It supports weight and doesn't creak. But one should consider that it is lower, which could make it more difficult for older people.
customer_reviews.author: blkwarmblood

customer_reviews.title: Seems sturdy enough so far
customer_reviews.text: The easiest to assemble bed I have come across and I did it all by myself! Seems sturdy enough so far...will post if anything changes. So far I love it. I am using it with a 10" memory foam mattress and it looks quite nice.
customer_reviews.author: Munz

customer_reviews.title: A Sturdy Bed for a Sturdy Price
customer_reviews.text: Overall, I love this bed frame. It took me roughly 2.5 hours to put together and the instructions were very straight forward. I love the drawers, they are actually quite big and allow room for extra storage. It doesn't squeak or anything when sat upon. I was nervous about the wooden slats at first. I used a rubber mallet to get them into place and they all have remained stable after multiple nights of rest. My dad and I even drilled my old headboard into the frame with 4 lag screws and it holds very well. I would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Savvy Tomlinson

customer_reviews.title: Take my word
customer_reviews.text: I love this frame!!! It's very sturdy !! Make sure you put it together tightly and use a good matteress! And yes I added my headboard as well !!
customer_reviews.author: Bavana

customer_reviews.title: Perfect, worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: This was a great purchase, we decided our son needed a full size bed and one where he couldn't stuff stuff underneath. This was really easy to set up, took no more then 30 minutes. Sturdy and is a really nice fabric! The wood slats snap into pieces that go into the metal parts of the frame making them more sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: NostalgiaGamer

customer_reviews.title: Quiet and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Talk about value! I’ve had cheap beds before and they’ve been noisy or broke. This is so sturdy, I was actually impressed! It’ll stay quiet during nighttime activities as well. Note that ours is on carpet, so I’m not sure it’s the same on other surfaces. Just make sure you are aware it’s fabric on the sides and not wood.
customer_reviews.author: Tara Ricco

customer_reviews.title: Really nice frame
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed with the sturdiness of this bedframe. Great purchase nice soft feel doesnt look cheap. Drawers are not directly attached so can be rolled completely out, they have a locking latch for when under bed. Bought memory foam mattress and its feels great. Would recommend and purchase again. Took couple hours to assemble instructions fairly simple.
customer_reviews.author: Re

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: I messed up and thought I ordered the model with storage. Even though I got the one without storage I still love it. Put it together myself in about 90 minutes. Looks sleek and modern. I have a converted attic bedroom so space is essential. No box spring needed, super comfortable. I Highly recommend this bed.
customer_reviews.author: Migi

customer_reviews.title: Queen frame more like a full
customer_reviews.text: This frame has a nice design, was fairly simple to assemble, but having ordered a queen size, my queen sized mattress doesn't sit in the frame like pictured. The rails on the side are completely covered by my mattress. The frame looks as though it is actually for a full sized mattress, rather than a queen. If you don't mind having your mattress on the rails, this is a good buy, if you want the design that is shown in the picture, look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Nice platform bed
customer_reviews.text: I got the twin for my son and I was disappointed to learn it had only one drawer. It was kind of misleading. Overall I love the bed. It’s very sturdy and a nice looking platform. Assembly was challenging since it has sooooooo many parts. But we managed and over all it’s a very nice bed.
customer_reviews.author: abel

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful piece of furniture
customer_reviews.text: Really beautiful once out together takes about 1-1.5hrs to assemble. Instructions were super clear and easy to read. Super heavy in the box so just be prepared to muscle it inside. Overall great value for the money does not squeak or anything of the sort pieces went on super smooth! Only thing is I have a king size mattress and I wish the sides came out more slightly to give it that defined platform look.
customer_reviews.author: Francisco

customer_reviews.title: Full mattress is narrower than Full frame
customer_reviews.text: Just spent my first night on it and I'm happy with my purchase so far! It went together super easy and the only thing I might suggest for those who don't have the best upper body or grip strength is to have a soft mallet available for snapping the slats to the frame. Instructions said press but I am just not strong enough. My biggest concern though is my full size new mattress is about 2 inches narrower than this full size bed frame.
customer_reviews.author: Chrys Zachary

customer_reviews.title: This bed is wonderful! Better then expected, and easy to put together!
customer_reviews.text: This bed is for use by my College Age Daughter when she is home. Otherwise used by Visiting Guests. The Storage is great for her belongings! I was concerned that the drawers would be hard to pull out on carpeting, but they roll smoothly. I put this bed together with some help from my Niece, directions were pretty much "Idiot Proof". It is sturdy, attractive and all Friends and Family now want one! I would recommend it, just watch your toes when making it up, not used to the sides being right there. 👍
customer_reviews.author: Anne S. Doheny

customer_reviews.title: Looks Great
customer_reviews.text: Frame looks great, was easy to assemble, and good price. Barely makes any noise when laying on it. My only slight concern is with the thickness of the wooden supports and the possiblity of one or more cracking/breaking. Still to early to tell but it has been over a month and I have not had any issues.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Moyer

customer_reviews.title: The instruction not clear at all poor quality. My husband said I would need plywood ...
customer_reviews.text: I sent this back the very next day wood slacks and the frame to small I order a double the frame is just a little bigger for a twin mattress. The instruction not clear at all poor quality .My husband said I would need plywood to go on top of the wood if you are looking for a platform frame buy zinus metal frame all metal. I did and love it.
customer_reviews.author: VAST

customer_reviews.title: Not worth
customer_reviews.text: Bed did not last a year, started falling apart the rib boards collapsed and the metal holding them up bent and broke.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste ur money or time
customer_reviews.text: Item was used, and had missing parts. Seems like I got someone else’s return, Wood doesn’t seem that sturdy either. Ugh I contacted customer service they need a huge list of info and proof of purchase to even send replacement parts, do not recommend
customer_reviews.author: melissa

customer_reviews.title: Footboard.....
customer_reviews.text: If you are like me, don't get the added footboard bottom base. I like to hang my feet off the bottom of the bed. They do not sell you the footboard by itself so if you don't like kicking the bottom rail when you sleep, order without. However I did manage to cut mine down, drilled new holes and put it back together. Works well enough for me now. This bed has been my primary bed for over a year, and it is still solid as can be.
customer_reviews.author: Ronnie

customer_reviews.title: It's okay
customer_reviews.text: Make sure you pay attention to both drop down boxes. Though the bed came with the drawers automatically, but they do not. You have to select them and then the bed is 2 times the price. It was fairly simple to put together and works well for our 8 year old.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Great.
customer_reviews.text: So it was really easy to assemble I’m trying to learn to be handy lol So if it was easy for me it’s easy for ANYONE I did it alone it took me a hour and a half to put together. Some holes didn’t match when putting together but I just made my own holes since it’s wood anyways
customer_reviews.author: Raymond Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Be prepared to fix yourself.
customer_reviews.text: Overall a good platform bed for the price you pay. However the wood used and the design of the slats are basically worthless. The slats are held in place by some plastic. I had to get heavier duty wood slats and place them over the platform to work for me.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Hill

customer_reviews.title: Easy to build
customer_reviews.text: So I haven't used it yet. I just recieved it today. I started putting it together at 2:45 this afternoon. It is now 4:00 pm. I put it together by myself, with a year old running around. It was easy to assemble. And I got it completed with a brand new mattress on it. It's very nice looking
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is okay for the price. I have had a small problem with the middle of the bed feeling like it is uphill where the center brace is. I haven't had it very long and I keep hoping it will smooth itself out. Not sure how that will happen but the bed looks great and so far seems to be very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Austen fan

customer_reviews.title: Size up
customer_reviews.text: Order the next size up from your mattress otherwise your mattress will cover the whole top and there will be no edges around the bed. Although there is still some gapage, I just tuck the comforter in and you can't tell. When sitting up against the wall I have noticed the bed does slide so I will get some grips, I do not have carpet. Easy to put together. Overall I am pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kyla J.

customer_reviews.title: Good bed
customer_reviews.text: Good bed, looks nice, and is very sturdy. 4 stars only because it took me 15492 years to put it together, and since I got it in january, one of the wooden panels broke just from me sitting on the wrong spot. I’m moving in a few weeks and I’m incredibly nervous about moving this bed, because I am pretty sure I’m going to lose some more panels having to take it apart, and I haven’t found replacement ones.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Anne

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: We bought this bed for my 13 year old daughter to put a memory foam mattress on. So far it has held up really well. It's very sturdy and was very easy to put together (I think it took me about 30 min). It comes very well packaged and the sides even come packaged in separate cloth sleeves so that the "leather" doesn't get damaged.
customer_reviews.author: A. Lloyd

customer_reviews.title: surprisingly solid for such an inexpensive bed
customer_reviews.text: Honestly I wasn't expecting much from this bed but once we put it together it is surprisingly sturdy and good looking! I recommend going slow, it is a cheap bed and the pieces are mostly plywood, but overall much better than expected.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Dailey

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together, looks nice too!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together, looks nice too! We’ve had a few guests sleep on it with no complaints. I was impressed with the packaging - everything was individually wrapped to keep every part safe. It was the best packaging I’ve ever seen and I order a lot of stuff on Amazon. We ordered a memory foam mattress from Amazon to use on the frame and that works great too.
customer_reviews.author: Avid Reader

customer_reviews.title: Easy to build and a beautiful base!
customer_reviews.text: This platform holds my Tempurpedic mattress, box spring, husband, myself and kids without any issues. It was very easy to assemble by myself in less than two hours. I would suggest using a cordless drill for the screws on the drawers, since each side uses about 24 screws, but there are pre-drilled holes, which makes manual assembly easy, as well.
customer_reviews.author: Patrice

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to put together, being as doe it was only me . They provide everything you need to use to put together. Material is great. you can leave box spring on it to make it higher if you please.
customer_reviews.author: sasha roman

customer_reviews.title: pretty and great bed
customer_reviews.text: I'm impressed with the way it was delivered. every piece was individually wrapped and it didn't take too long to assemble. it's a gorgeous looking bed and very sturdy. the only con is that i never wanna get up in the mornings now 😅
customer_reviews.author: kitty♡

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids. Wouldn't buy for adults
customer_reviews.text: These beds are great for kids. We bought 3 for our 3 kids. Each kid has a drawer for their extra blankets and on the other side we put all of their stuffed animals underthe boards. They love them
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Wolk

customer_reviews.title: EASY YO ASSEMBLE
customer_reviews.text: I was definitely worried when I bought this but it was so easy to put together. I did it all by myself and it took about two hours, but I did not need someone else to help me with that
customer_reviews.author: PammyJ44130

customer_reviews.title: Overall great bedframe
customer_reviews.text: For the price I think it's amazing. It's got a clean look to it and I was able to assemble it by myself in about an hour. I just set it up so I cant say how sturdy it is, but so far everything else about it is great.
customer_reviews.author: Cassidy Swanson

customer_reviews.title: I love our new platform bed it came with easy to ...
customer_reviews.text: I love our new platform bed it came with easy to follow directions and was just as easy to put together. Was even able to use my head board by mounting to the wall over the frame. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Kirkpatrick

customer_reviews.title: Great choice!
customer_reviews.text: My husband put this all together in about an hour, including clean up. The bed is sturdy, and well made. I love the grey linen look. Now I’m onto some new down comforters.
customer_reviews.author: susan

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and attractive platform
customer_reviews.text: I love the platform. It's solid and doesn't take up much room. Very sleek and simple design that gets a lot of compliments. The only issue I have is that the sides don't stick out as much as they should. It's covered entirely by the bed.
customer_reviews.author: Javier

customer_reviews.title: Overall sturdy, looks great, does the job as expected. Assembly was troublesome.
customer_reviews.text: The overall size of the bed frame, as well as the look and feel of the material, and the slide-out drawers make it a very nice product for its price. The only real issue I had was with the assembly: the holes for the screws did not always align properly for the drawers and made their construction far more difficult than I'd have liked.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny C.

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Really happy with this purchase. I was looking for an inexpensive bed frame for a spare bedroom for when my grandson sleeps over, I could have gone with a cheap basic metal frame but wanted something with a more finished look. When the box came is was pretty beat up so I was nervous, but inside everything was packaged perfectly, lots of cardboard for protection and all the pieces were in perfect condition. Super easy to put together even with my 6 year old grandson helping. I would definitely purchase again, maybe a queen size for the third bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: E. Flynn

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied!!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this frame. It took about 2 hrs to put together but if you take your time and follow the instructions you should have no major hiccups. I would recommend using a battery operated drill for putting the drawers together. I did not realize how much higher my mattress would be on the new frame. I definitely recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: LR

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Love this bed!! It’s perfect!! Easy to put together. We thought the drawers would be small, but they’re pretty big. We were also worried about the slats being creaky/squeaky, but this bed makes ZERO noise!! We love it!!
customer_reviews.author: ashlie lamere

customer_reviews.title: Mistakes?
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely terrible. First of all they gave me the wrong size. We tried to make it work but the center piece broke in 2 days now is sinks in the middle. Also the wood pieces don't even pop in the hole it stripped. The middle pole bent and now it wont stay. I hope they can help me fix this issue cause i really liked this bed.
customer_reviews.author: jordan

customer_reviews.title: I don't usually write reviews, but trust me and don't buy this
customer_reviews.text: It took me and two other people an incredibly long time to put this together. It was so bad that we gave up on putting the draws together fully. The system to hold the slats in place is pretty terrible. Once they are in, you can't move them without breaking the pieces. It's probably the worst solution I've seen. (I've seen other bed frames use velcro to keep the slats from sliding, which works really well.) Overall, I really am not a fan of this at all.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Ledbetter

customer_reviews.title: Can I purchase spare black plastic caps?
customer_reviews.text: The black plastic caps broke too easily. Possibly due to having a memory foam mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander Babel

customer_reviews.title: Affordable and better than traditional box springs
customer_reviews.text: This platform is a lot sturdier than I was expecting and was easy to put together. It came in two boxes, had instructions that were very detailed. Mine is missing footers but doesn't seem to affect anything. The king size is great, and holds my mattress well. At first it looks like the frame is to big but after you add your bedding it's perfect. Would purchase this again. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Durable bed
customer_reviews.text: The bed frame is great and has 2 convenient drawers. I thought the drawers could be optionally placed on the same side in case I'd like to move my bed up against the wall, but the drawers can only be built on each side.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis Mariah Pedraza

customer_reviews.title: Easy assembly
customer_reviews.text: Super simple to put together, took me maybe 20 minutes, and a very clever design, I with it was a bit taller, like another 3 inches, but it looks nice to, ot doesnt look cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Sean S.

customer_reviews.title: Loving it!
customer_reviews.text: My father and I put this together in less than an hour. Assembly was pretty easy, although I think without him it would have been a little harder. The bed seems sturdy and I'm very pleased with the purchase. If I have any issues, I will update as they occur.
customer_reviews.author: Candace Culp

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Very well made. Good quality materials. No issues putting it together, only took a couple hours from start to finish with sheets and all.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Good👍🏻
customer_reviews.text: I received the bed yesterday, I managed to get the bed inside my house but I had to wait for assistance to carry it upstairs. It took my boyfriend and I 4 hours (including our dinner break) to put together. The drawers were the hardest for us, none of the holes were actual holes so it took way longer. The bed looks so clean and I love it! My boyfriend and I weigh around 300 together and it was good to sleep on last night!
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Drawers not on rails
customer_reviews.text: So the drawers are just rolling around on the ground which leads to it not exactly lining up with the "hook" that you use to lock it in place. It holds the bed up and seems okay so far.
customer_reviews.author: jeffrey

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, I’d screw the nails in to get any dust out of the holes for the wheels before trying to scare them on. Overall really nice bed, looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: it sleeps good and is very study and his back doesn't hurt ...
customer_reviews.text: My Husband had me to order this bed frame off of my account , it sleeps good and is very study and his back doesn't hurt as much as it did on our old bed frame we would recommend this to any other customer to buy we love it thanks very much.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Lynette Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This Bed was everything that I expected it to be and MORE!
customer_reviews.author: Beth M. Lee

customer_reviews.title: Well made for great price
customer_reviews.text: Has great storage. Built well. Sturdy. Have a queen mattress and doesn’t look cheap. The 2 drawers are in front. One in each side and are deep. Great bed frame.
customer_reviews.author: angela n.

customer_reviews.title: Easy and secure
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed and super easy to put together! Did need an extra set of hands, especially when putting the slats together. So many slats... but also feels very secure because of them! 10/10 packed perfectly
customer_reviews.author: Brittleboo

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: WORST PRODUCT I HAVE ORDERED SO FAR The instructions are poor. Not all of the components were labeled and the diagrams were obscure. Not only that but the pieces came bent, chipped, and scratched. The drawers do not fit right and honestly it was just a huge waste of money and time. Not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Dominique Antunez

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!!
customer_reviews.text: This bed is amazing!! All of the parts are marked and large pieces wrapped carefully in cloth bags. We were so surprised by the quality. We love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Jan Dittmar

customer_reviews.title: This bed platform had held up pretty well. It looks a lot more expensive than ...
customer_reviews.text: This bed platform had held up pretty well. It looks a lot more expensive than it really is. One problem though. Sometimes a support plank slips out of it's slot and you have to take the entire mattress off to put it back in place. Also, a couple of the plastic attachments that hold the wooden planks broke. Overall it looks very modern and simplistic.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Great bed frame - but not for a regular queen sized mattress.
customer_reviews.text: Love this bed frame! But it seems like it’s more for a full size mattress than a queen. We put our queen mattress on it and you can’t see the frame. The mattress also slips off a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Madeline Hunt

customer_reviews.title: Great design
customer_reviews.text: Lovely bedframe and the drawers are dont stick out - they blend right in! My only complaint was it arrived a month late and the process of tracking was awful. Worth the buy but plan ahead!!!
customer_reviews.author: Krysten Savage

customer_reviews.title: Upset
customer_reviews.text: Had a rip came damaged. And company wanted to refund 30$ with me signing a contract to never hold them liable for accident or damages and waiver my warranty rights. That was bull for an already damaged item which they say will send any part but not the one that's damaged. BS
customer_reviews.author: Gramma Biker

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble, great quality!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Put it together by myself in less than an hour, super easy to follow instructions and everything is labeled. Only slept on it one night but seems pretty sturdy! The quality is really nice too!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Better than traditional bed frame or box spring
customer_reviews.text: Installation is very simple: 4 side pieces held together by metal plates with screws. Then line up the slates and you're done.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan L

customer_reviews.title: Cute but needs to be more sturdy
customer_reviews.text: It's a cute bed frame and we like it a lot, but the boards broke within a month which isn't good.. but it was pretty cheap for a bed frame so. 🤷‍♀️
customer_reviews.author: Jessica E.

product_meta.title: DHP Maven Upholstered Bed, Black, Queen
product_meta.description: Style:Bed| Size:Queen| Color:Black Faux LeatherDorel Home Products is committed to providing unique and functional furniture pieces at affordable prices. The Maven Upholstered Platform Bed from DHP is the perfect addition to your bedroom and makes a great sleeping solution in your guest room with its simple and serene feel. With the Maven's clean lines, sleek detailing, and low profile height, it emits a modern, stylish look. Metal side rails guarantee stability and durability with a center metal rail and leg for added support. The slat bases allow air to pass freely beneath your bed, keeping your mattress fresher longer. The slats adapt to weight exerted on them, providing you with the right amount of support, so a box spring is not required. Metal side rails guarantee stability and durability with a center metal rail and leg for added support. Set up this platform bed in minutes—everything you need is inside the box. Once assembled, this bed measures 60" W x 80" D x 11" H.
feature_bullets: The Maven Upholstered Platform Bed from DHP is the perfect addition to your bedroom and makes a great sleeping solution in your guest room with its simple and serene feel

With the Maven's clean lines, sleek detailing, and low profile height, it emits a modern, stylish look. Metal side rails guarantee stability and durability with a center metal rail and leg for added support
The slat bases allow air to pass freely beneath your bed, keeping your mattress fresher longer
The slats adapt to weight exerted on them, providing you with the right amount of support, so a box spring is not required
Set up this platform bed in minutes—everything you need is inside the box. Once assembled, this bed measures 60" W x 80" D x 11" H
